meanings: (부사) every day, daily, from day to day

그날. On that very day. 듣기 View video SONAMOO : 꽃보다소나무(디애나랑2)
그날 잘 들어갔지? Did you go home safely that day? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 정신차려보니 나만 보는 잘생긴 또라이랑 썸 타는 중;; [인서울2] - 철또하림 모음.zip
vlive.english: Did you go home safely that day?

vlive.korean: 내가 그날 작사 할게, 어때? I'll write the lyrics. How does that sound? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : HYO's 'DESSERT' COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: I'll write the lyrics. How does that sound?

vlive.korean: 그날이 언제였는지 알아? Do you know when it was? 듣기 View video ITZY : [ #ITZY ] 오해피랴데이💕
vlive.english: Do you know when it was?

examples.korean: The memory of that day still haunts me. 발음듣기 그날의 기억이 아직도 내 뇌리에 계속 떠오른다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The memory of that day still haunts me. 발음

examples.korean: She had been foully murdered during the night. 발음듣기 그녀는 그날 밤에 잔혹하게 살해됐었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had been foully murdered during the night. 발음

examples.korean: She remembered the pleasantness of the evening. 발음듣기 그녀는 그날 저녁의 그 즐거움을 기억했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She remembered the pleasantness of the evening. 발음

examples.korean: They spent the day swimming and sunbathing. 발음듣기 그들은 수영을 하고 일광욕을 하며 그 날을 보냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They spent the day swimming and sunbathing. 발음

examples.korean: That day is stamped indelibly on my memory. 발음듣기 그날은 내 기억 속에 지울 수 없는 각인으로 남아 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That day is stamped indelibly on my memory. 발음
